support: bruno3dcontato@gmail.com

left slider: MAX_CHECKS_PER_FRAME
maximum number of objects that can be searched per frame.
If your computer performs poorly or your project is too large (have too many files),
leave the value smaller. 
The larger the value, the more files will be processed per frame.

right slider: ELEMENT_SIZE
changes the size of items displayed in the list.

========== Navigation =============

Arrow Up         -> Move seletion up
Arrow Down       -> Move seletion down
		         
Page Up          -> Roll up one page
Page Down        -> Roll down one page
		         
Home Page        -> Go to the first item
End Page         -> Go to the last item
		         
Enter            -> Select the UnityObject
Esc(ape)         -> Select the last Selected UnityObject
			     
Drag Up/Down     -> Roll up/down the scroll list
Drag Left/Right  -> Start Drag UnityObject Reference

any questions, please contact-me :D
